Translations.Text: Win iu$en awal i Umazan, iu$ awal i Oebbi. Win iwexxoen, ur k id Nuzen d ameareb nnsen
Qqaoen: "annuz"! Mi k iiaxxoen, ad ieekku deg iv, urbaa segsen, ayen ur d tenniv. Oebbi Ipparu ayen eekkun deg iv. Wexxeo asen, ppkel $ef Oebbi. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi d Awkil
Day ur pmeyyizen ara Leqwoan? Lemmer illi si war Oebbi, ad afen degs aias n wayen imgarraden

Ma iusa ten lameo n laman ne$ n lxuf, a t berreen. Lemmer i t ssawven i Umazan akked imawlan n lameo nnsen, ad xeboen wid, segsen, ib$an ad eoen. Lemmer macci d lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S fellawen, a ppeddum d Cciian, siwa kra kan
Nna$ deg ubrid n Oebbi. D iman ik kan ara tkellfev. Efk afud i lmumnin. Izmer Oebbi ad Issers tazmert n wid ijehlen. Oebbi Yif iten tazmert, Yif iten aaaqeb
Win icefaan ccafuaa ilhan, ad iawi, segs, amur. Win icefaan ccafuaa icemten, ad iawi, segs, sin imuren. Oebbi Izga Issenqad yal cci
Ma nnan awen d: "azul"! Erret asen azul it yifen, ne$ erret asen t. Ih, Oebbi Izga Ieeppeb yal cci
